review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2021
name: Amazon Customer
title: Best coconut-based yogurt!
review: Great flavor! It doesn’t have a coconut taste. The consistency is like regular dairy yogurt (not Greek yogurt). I was able to use it in both sweet and savory dishes. And for someone who is sensitive to so many ingredients, this was a real winner for me.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2021
name: M
title: Tastes very good
review: The taste is great ! I like that it is non dairy, but still has more sugar than I would have liked. .

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2021
name: Mari
title: Yummy

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2021
name: Amazon Customer
title: Buy!
review: Our favorite unsweetened yogurt on the market. Always creamy and delicious.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2021
name: Matt
title: Good taste and unsweetened
review: Very good and unsweetened! You must try! Since it's unsweetened you can comfortably add fruits etc as you choose fit.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2020
name: Nabila
title: Perfect for dairy free life
review: Really yummy, perfect for replacement of dairy yogurt, perfect for recipes, I really liked it, you can add whatever you want, thats why I like always having the unsweetened one...

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2021
name: jseldercare
title: Tasty, creamy alternative
review: The flavor is mild, the yogurt is very creamy however it does taste a little bit better if you put some peanut butter powder in it or a teaspoon of jam. I like to add peanut butter powder and a couple of Lily’s chocolate chips.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2021
name: L.O.
title: Always Moldy!!
review: I actually love these yogurts but I have purchased more moldy containers then edible ones and for that reason I have to stop buying. They are either totally moldy with black mold, pink mold, and even white fuzzy mold. I have purchased tons of yogurts in my life and have never experienced something like this and so consistently. It is literally at least every other container or sometimes every container. Unfortunately something is not right with these. It’s beyond disgusting and so unsafe.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2021
name: Tony H
title: Unopened product got moldy a month before expiry date
review: I bought two of these and the unopened product got moldy a month before the expiry date. This happened with two out of the three tubs I bought.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2021
name: Christian
title: Love it
review: Best non dairy Joghurt for me. I tried a lot of different ones but this is the best and I always come back to it if I need Joghurt. The Coconut one has a better taste than the almond but they are both great!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2021
name: J & S D.
title: No longer calcium fortified!
review: We are mostly plant-based eaters and this was such a great way to boost calcium intake for my kids.They would eat this with berries and seeds for breakfast or dessert.I just got a new tub and it doesn’t mention anything about being reformulated, but there is no added calcium.I will look for another brand.Disappointed!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2021
name: Christina P.
title: Just get some

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2021
name: ELLIOTT
title: what am i eating
review: I constantly question my life choices as I put this in my mouth..... the consistency is like... face lotion.... and the coconut scent is super strong so.... beware. but it's vegan yogurt¯\_(ツ)_/¯

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2021
name: Rebecca
title: The best plain yogurt
review: Very good !Eat alone or add fruit

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2021
name: Tboo28
title: Didn’t care for flavor or texture.
review: I liked that it was dairy free, but the flavor and texture we’re not to my liking.I used in shakes to mask flavor & texture.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2021
name: Jasmine Matos
title: My favorite!
review: This by far my favorite non dairy yogurt.
